project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API. The program will display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the functionality to fetch weather data from a public API
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement the command-line interface to accept city input from the user
Implement error handling for API requests (e.g., city not found)
Write tests for the fetching and parsing of weather data
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
